appObjectDesc.scriptText: ;***************************************************************************************** ;* Script : ADD_ROW ;* ;* Function : to add row to table as java script function addRow cannot handle blank char ;* ;* Created by : gregk 28jun12 ;* Params : #1 - Table Name (I), #2 - Text Record (I), #3 - Delimiter (I) ;* Modified : ¥ Σ @ ;***************************************************************************************** insert_table_row #1 #2 '' #3
